channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek On Air – Episode 9 – iOS App Store Promotion Clause, Gravity Vs Accelerometer, and Corona Certified Developer Program News

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Mobile friendly websites really seem like a no-brainer but I can't tell you the number of times that I've been to a website that promotes mobile apps that is not mobile friendly. I wonder if this is just because people don't think about it or if it's just the level of effort required. I guess it also depends on what the definition of mobile friendly website is.
item.content:encoded: Mobile friendly websites really seem like a no-brainer but I can’t tell you the number of times that I’ve been to a website that promotes mobile apps that is not mobile friendly. I wonder if this is just because people don’t think about it or if it’s just the level of effort required. I guess it also depends on what the definition of mobile friendly website is.
